All Classes

  • All Classes Interface Summary Class Summary Enum Summary 
    Class Description
    GamePanel
    this interface belongs to the class "GamePanelImpl" the methods are described in the class "GamePanelImpl"
    GamePanelImpl
    this class contains methods which describe the stats visible on the game panel the methods "copyState", "getState" and "setState" have been successfully test with JUnit (see "GamePanelTest")
    GameServiceAutoSimulationMode
    this class contains methods necessary for proceeding automatically simulation
    GameServiceButtons
    this class introduces the buttons relevant for playing Conway's Game of Life
    GameServiceMainOperations
    this class contains methods which describe the main activities
    GameServiceStepwiseSimulationMode
    this class contains methods necessary for proceeding manually simulation
    PixelState
    this enum defines the possible states which can appear in this game: alive or dead
    Rules
    this interface belongs to the class "RulesImpl" the methods are described in the class "RulesImpl"
    RulesImpl
    this class contains methods which describe the rules of "Conway's Game of Life" the rules are following: 1.
